attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.

attributes.description: Portofino Blue with Ebony Interior.  Balance of Factory Warranty expiring the sooner of 100 000km or 29th November 2025. Trade ins Appreciated. Finance Facilities are Available. Delivery can be arranged to most parts of SA.

attributes.description:
Motus TOYOTA Nelspruit offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome

attributes.title: 2021 Renault Kwid 1.0 Dynamique

attributes.description:
Experience big thinking in the small details with the Atos. It’s low in fuel consumption and big on safety, but nothing compares to seeing, driving and feeling it all for yourself. It’s the small big things that make the biggest difference.
On-road entertainment is the name of the game and getting an Atos is how you play it right. The Atos comes standard with Infotainment with Apple Carplay, so you can access your playlists from all music streaming apps, chat hands-free on WhatsApp and explore your city using your favourite navigation app.
The Atos radiates beauty from both inside and out with full-size wheel covers and a high mounted stop lamp. Express your persona and find the colour that compliments your style from polar white to fiery red.

attributes.description:
Carpointe- At Tavcor George we believe in first class customer service. 
All our Vehicles undergo a 80 Point Mechanical Check, AA Roadworthy Test and is Accident free unless advertised as otherwise. 
We do accept trade-ins of all Makes and Models. 
We have dedicated Finance Managers that can arrange finance for you should you want to finance the vehicle. We also offer Value Added Products like Service and Warranty Plan Extensions. 
We deliver Nationwide and charge a delivery fee depending on the distance of delivery. 
Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R4000, Lic /Reg of R781, Number plates of R400.
